description.p: URDF description for the Yaskawa GP7 manipulator.
This package contains kinematic descriptions, 3D models and launch files for the Yaskawa GP7 manipulator.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online http://www.motoman.com/manuals All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
